Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI

Class MoveController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.BoardUpdater
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.MoveController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MoveController extends BoardUpdater implements GUIController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class MoveController is the controller of the Move Scene where the client perform the action that involved the move of students or the selection of the island
